title: LF Silver+ Jungle, Mid, and Adc
body:
Hello summoners this is Ares Champion and I am looking for some replacements for the jungle, mid, and adc roles (as listed in title). Our team name is Masters of Olympus and we are a team that strongly focuses on not just individual strength but also your skills to work as a team. We are a casual team that wants to get better and play some ranked. Our schedule for practice and ranked will be determined on the schedule of the team but we will have a constant schedule.  If you want to join feel free to add me online and post the following questions below.
IGN-
Rank-
Role-
Have curse voice (if not can download)-
Top Champs-
Can Shot call-


       Thanks for your time and hop to see you on the rift.

replies.body:
IGN- Mezzie
Rank- Bronze 1 currently (Silver 2 last season)
Role- ADC
Have curse voice (if not can download)- Yes
Top Champs- Jinx, Lucian, Vayne, Graves, Corki
Can Shot call- Yes

IGN Wreckzz
Rank Season 5 - Silver II
Role ADC
Have curse voice (if not can download) Yes
Top Champs (in order) {{champion:67}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:104}} 
Can Shot call... Decently

Role- Jungle
Have curse voice (if not can download)- yes
Top Champs- I play most junglers, whichever fit the team or meta. 
Currently, {{champion:254}} {{champion:80}}  {{champion:72}}  {{champion:24}} {{champion:19}}
